headline.main: Turning Point: Germany Hoped to Close Border in 2015, Didn't
headline.print_headline: Turning Point: Germany Hoped to Close Border in 2015, Didn't

lead_paragraph: Germany planned to close its border with Austria and turn back asylum-seekers in September 2015, a move that could have dramatically changed the course of the European refugee crisis that was at its peak at the time, according to a German newspaper.
